message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering the inflation loss you'll incur if we go to further rounds.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but the inflation hits me hard. Let's be realistic: 55-45 split ensures a good deal for both of us.
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I'll make a slight concession from my initial offer. 58-42 is still a fair deal.
Alice, we're getting closer, but we need to factor in the time pressure as well. 52-48 is a strong offer, and it benefits us to wrap this up sooner rather than later.
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I can get a bit more. 57-43 is my new offer, considering the increasing inflation impact on your side.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  We're running out of time and the value keeps dropping for me. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Let's end this.
